titleStmt.title: A triple almanacke for the yeere of our Lorde God 1591, being the thirde from the leape yeare wherein is conteyned, not onely the common accompt, which in this our realme is vsed, with the Romane kalender according to the late correction of Gregorie, but also, the true computation and reduction of the monethes ... referred principally to the meridian of London and for most respectes will serue for all Englande, and many other countries also.
titleStmt.author: J. D.

titleStmt.title: A triple almanacke for the yeere of our Lorde God 1591, being the thirde from the leape yeare wherein is conteyned, not onely the common accompt, which in this our realme is vsed, with the Romane kalender according to the late correction of Gregorie, but also, the true computation and reduction of the monethes ... referred principally to the meridian of London and for most respectes will serue for all Englande, and many other countries also.
titleStmt.author: J. D.
Dade, John, fl. 1589-1614.
Dee, John, 1527-1608.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard VVatkins and Iames Robertes,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Dade and to John Dee by STC (2nd ed.).
"A prognostication for the same yeere M.D.XCI. ... / by J.D." has special t.p. with imprint: Imprinted at London : By Richard VVatkins and Iames Robertes.
Place of imprint and name of publisher taken from special t.p. for "A prognostication"; date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Signatures: A-C⁴ D², ² A⁴ B².
Imperfect: t.p. torn and faded with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
